text: Alice in Thunderdome is the third studio album by American hip hop artist Rob Sonic. It was released on OK-47 Records on August 26, 2014. == Music == Alice in Thunderdome is the first album where Rob Sonic has had featured productions from other artists which he is not credited for. Production contributors are Aesop Rock and Edison. Guest appearances include Aesop Rock and Breeze Brewin. == Track listing == == References == == External links == * Alice In Thunderdome at Bandcamp * Alice In Thunderdome at Discogs Category:2014 albums Category:Rob Sonic albums
title: Alice in Thunderdome
